__e: We have to talk to her, even if the FBI is all over her.
I don't want you talking with the fbi on my behalf.
Where was the fbi in all of this?
So did the FBI, so did the cops.
That's why we have an FBI and a police force.
And the FBI and the police can try, but I'm the only person that can end this.
I have the full resources of the FBI and the Justice Department behind me on this, and we always get what we're after.
- Want me to call the FBI and the army?

You know, don't-don't take this the wrong way, but I just, I can't really believe that with all the people that the FBI and the DIA have at their disposal, the only one who can handle this job is you.
So, he why you left the FBI and hooked up with us ?
That's right, you have the FBI, and I have ten more minutes.
I'm not FBI, and he's not a...
You think the F.B.I. are the only ones on this guy?
Tomorrow, I'll meet with the guy I know at the FBI. Things are finally happening.
I already told your FBI boy I don't know anything.
If there are feds here, they're here for me.
Have you cleared any of it with her superiors?
I think the FBI is investigating our... business last year.
Well, the FBI are on it. There's nothing more I can do.
How about you? Tell us why the FBI is on the case?
Ok, but if the FBI is handling this case, why are you talking to me?
I have no idea, but he can't know the FBI is after him. Yeah, he'll think you sold him out.
You must be the F.B.I. guy, huh?
Look, talking to an FBI agent is not a great idea for me right now.
You do realize I work for the FBI, right?
The FBI has no idea where you are, so he can take you down.
- So the FBI had nothing to do with it?
Oh, no, no. The bureau has nothing to do with this.
The FBI has no idea where you are, so he can take you down.
Oh, no, no. The bureau has nothing to do with this.
- So the FBI had nothing to do with it?
Your friend brought an FBI agent here to talk to you.
That looks like the fbi to me.
Look, I have no problem telling the FBI to bugger off.
